TSRM Template: Thermal Stack Reliability Module, Input JSON File Template
Template Description: Used for submitting inputs directly into the tsrm_api.py file.
Input Description: Cooling Type: Denotes the type of cooling system used on the server rack to cool the CPU/GPU Processor.
Input Description: Processor Type: Denotes the type of CPU/GPU processor being used in the server.
Input Description: Heat transfer Coeffic: Denotes the environmental conditions of the Thermal Stack package (applies to all faces for now).
Input Description: Ambient Temperature: Denotes the environmental conditions of the Thermal Stack package (applies to all faces for now).
Input Options: Ambient Temperature: Temperature in kelvin (K) or Degree Celcius (°C).
Input Description: Processing Temperatur: Denotes the environmental conditions of the Thermal Stack package (applies to all faces for now).
Input Options: Processing Temperature: Temperature in kelvin (K) or Degree Celcius (°C).
Input Description: Initial Temperature: Denotes the environmental conditions of the Thermal Stack package (applies to all faces for now).
Input Options: Initial Temperature: Temperature in kelvin (K) or Degree Celcius (°C).
